trans-unit.source: Provides information about a user's capabilities to view and modify personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre as capacidades de um utilizador para ver e modificar os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: At various points in the life cycle of a Web Parts application, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object needs to check the capabilities of the current user to determine what personalization data the user can view and modify.
trans-unit.target: Em vários pontos no ciclo de vida de uma aplicação de peças Web, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>objeto tem de verificar as capacidades do utilizador atual para determinar quais os dados de personalização de utilizador pode visualizar e modificar.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: When this need arises, the personalization object checks instances of the WebPartUserCapability class.
trans-unit.target: Quando for este necessário, o objeto de personalização verifica instâncias da classe WebPartUserCapability.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts personalization feature defines two user capabilities, each of which is represented by a WebPartUserCapability object.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade de personalização de peças Web define duas funções de utilizador, cada um dos quais é representada por um objeto de WebPartUserCapability.

trans-unit.source: Both of these objects have corresponding verbs that can be used to specify user capabilities within the `<authorization>` section of a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Ambos estes objetos têm verbos correspondentes que podem ser utilizados para especificar as capacidades de utilizador dentro de `<authorization>` secção de um ficheiro Web. config.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [autorização elemento para personalização de peças Web (esquema de definições do ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434).

trans-unit.source: The different user capabilities are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: As capacidades de outro utilizador são apresentadas na tabela seguinte.

trans-unit.source: |User capability|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |`modifyState`|Indicates that the current user can save personalization data to the data store.
trans-unit.target: | Capacidade de utilizador | Descrição | |---------------------|-----------------| | `modifyState`| Indica que o utilizador atual pode guardar os dados de personalização para o arquivo de dados.

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.| |`enterSharedScope`|Indicates that the current user can enter Shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Acedidos através do campo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>num objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>. | | `enterSharedScope`| Indica que o utilizador atual pode introduzir o âmbito de personalização partilhada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.| The WebPartUserCapability class has one public property.
trans-unit.target: Acedidos através do campo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability>num objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>. | A classe de WebPartUserCapability tem uma propriedade pública.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A> property indicates the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A>propriedade indica o nome de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartUserCapability class also has two exposed methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartUserCapability também tem dois métodos expostos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A> method allows two user capability objects to be compared.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A>método permite dois objetos de capacidade de utilizador a ser comparada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The objects are considered equal if they have the same name.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos são considerados igual se tiverem o mesmo nome.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A> method generates a hash code based on the name of the WebPartUserCapability object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A>método gera um código hash com base no nome do objeto WebPartUserCapability.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a name for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém um nome para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: name is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameé ou uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> object, or has the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*> value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> objeto ou tem o mesmo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>a comparar com a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if o is equal to the current or has the same value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o é igual a atual ou tem o mesmo valor; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash de número inteiro com sinal de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string value identifying the class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor de cadeia que identifica a classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that identifies the class.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que identifica a extensão de classe.</xref:System.String>
